K14ajitsvyu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān* śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:2: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā
K14ajitsvyu:3: ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāripu[treṇa āyuṣmatā ca] pūrṇena maitrāyaṇī[putreṇa] ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:4: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratas tasthur dvātriṃśatā bodhisatvasahasraiḥ
K14ajitsvyu:5: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena anikṣiptadhureṇa
K14ajitsvyu:6: ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena avalokiteśvareṇa
K14ajitsvyu:7: ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena /
K14ajitsvyu:9: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā
K14ajitsvyu:10: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratas tasthuḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:11: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramā[traḥ] śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat* /
K14ajitsvyu:15: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayām āsa /
K14ajitsvyu:16: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:28: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:29: atha bhagavān* śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:30: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā [hiraṇya]mayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan* /
K14ajitsvyu:31: tathā śrāvastyāṃ ma[hānagaryāṃ] mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan* /
K14ajitsvyu:32: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:36: atha sa puruṣas taṃ janakāyaṃ samāśvāsayann evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:38: asminn eva pṛthivīpradeśe jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:39: tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ
K14ajitsvyu:43: atha sa janakāyas taṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalir [evam āha] /
K14ajitsvyu:44: yat tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya gu[ṇavarṇasamudīraṇa]samaye idaṃ śubhanimittam abhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:45: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
K14ajitsvyu:46: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣas taṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:47: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
K14ajitsvyu:50: svargaṃ ca so yāsyati śīghram evam* /
K14ajitsvyu:51: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
K14ajitsvyu:58: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe
K14ajitsvyu:63: yat kiṃci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ
K14ajitsvyu:73: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ puruṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇam udīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:74: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:75: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan* /
K14ajitsvyu:76: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisatvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ (Asv 107)
K14ajitsvyu:78: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K14ajitsvyu:81: atha bhagavān ā[nandena saha nagarā]valambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe samāgato 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:82: atha bhagavān nagarāvalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayām āsa /
K14ajitsvyu:83: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:85: mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:86: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāram asiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:87: atha [sā] dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśru[kaṇṭhī] rudantī gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:89: varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam* /
K14ajitsvyu:93: anāthabhūtā aham adyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe //
K14ajitsvyu:95: atha sa nagarāvalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe [niṣaṇṇā] imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:96: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputro 'ntarīkṣagataḥ sthitaś cintayati sma /
K14ajitsvyu:98: anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunis tathāgato nagarāvalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:99: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ
K14ajitsvyu:100: gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagarāvalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:101: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputro nagarāvalambikāṃ dārikām evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:102: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imāny anekaśatasahasramūlyāny ābharaṇāni /
K14ajitsvyu:103: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantam upanāmaya /
K14ajitsvyu:104: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā
K14ajitsvyu:107: atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ nagarāvalambikām evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:108: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhukkakutsundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhis tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
K14ajitsvyu:109: anto bhaviṣyati strībhāvād anto bhaviṣyati daridragṛhāt* /
K14ajitsvyu:110: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā (Asv 109)
K14ajitsvyu:112: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kasmiṃścid daridragṛhe upapadyeya /
K14ajitsvyu:113: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate datvā svagṛhagamanam ārabdhā /
K14ajitsvyu:114: atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ nagarāvalambikāṃ dārikām evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:118: atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇi[pātena] bhagavantaṃ prapatitā /
K14ajitsvyu:119: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā bhagava[ntaṃ gā]thābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:130: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi
K14ajitsvyu:137: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat*
K14ajitsvyu:143: na cā kariṣye punar eva pāpaṃ
K14ajitsvyu:148: nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle //
K14ajitsvyu:151: yat kiṃci pāpaṃ tadapūrva yat kṛtaṃ
K14ajitsvyu:153: atha sā nagarāvalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā pu[nar api] gṛhagamanam ārabdhā /
K14ajitsvyu:156: pratinivartasva [dārike pūrvajātinidānaṃ sa]manusmarāmi tad ahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
K14ajitsvyu:159: ya[d yat kṛtaṃ] pāpa sadā sudāruṇam* /
K14ajitsvyu:172: atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ dārikām evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:173: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K14ajitsvyu:174: samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K14ajitsvyu:175: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
K14ajitsvyu:176: tena (Asv 112) khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhāny abhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:177: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatir abhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:179: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati /
K14ajitsvyu:180: yadā tvadgṛham āgato 'bhūt tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhān niṣkrāntā punar eva praviṣṭābhūḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:182: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśa kalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punar daridragṛhe duḥkhāny anubhūtāni /
K14ajitsvyu:185: yat tvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate 'dhvani
K14ajitsvyu:186: acintyair aparimāṇaiḥ kalpair nagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K14ajitsvyu:187: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* loke /
K14ajitsvyu:188: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:189: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi /
K14ajitsvyu:192: yādṛśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
K14ajitsvyu:195: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumasyajātā svagṛhagamanam ārabdhā /
K14ajitsvyu:196: atha bhagavāṃs tāṃ dārikām evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:197: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi /
K14ajitsvyu:199: pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājā ajitaseno nāma /
K14ajitsvyu:201: tasya khalu punā rājño 'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase /
K14ajitsvyu:202: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati /
K14ajitsvyu:203: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:204: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:221: athāyuṣmān ānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratas tasthau /
K14ajitsvyu:222: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
K14ajitsvyu:229: ye kecid ānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parīkṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
K14ajitsvyu:230: avaivartikās te bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante /
K14ajitsvyu:232: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavaṃs taiḥ satvaiḥ kuśalamūlam avaropitam* /
K14ajitsvyu:234: śṛṇu ānanda ye satvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope vartamāne saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
K14ajitsvyu:235: ye satvā [vā] araṇyāyatane gaṇḍyākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi parikṣayaṃ (Asv 115) yāsyanti
K14ajitsvyu:237: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ śāntapraśāntena gaṇḍīm ākoṭayate sma /
K14ajitsvyu:238: atha tena gaṇdīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan* /
K14ajitsvyu:239: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
K14ajitsvyu:240: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt* sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:241: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam āmantrayate sma /
K14ajitsvyu:242: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
K14ajitsvyu:243: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako bhagavantam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:244: na bhagavan* śakṣyāmas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ gantum* /
K14ajitsvyu:249: na te satvās te śakṣyante bālāgram api kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitād vyavaropayitum* /
K14ajitsvyu:250: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyān diśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:251: atha rājā ajitasenas taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:256: atha so 'mātyo nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:257: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati /
K14ajitsvyu:259: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
K14ajitsvyu:262: na ca sa bhikṣus tava pārśve āgacchati
K14ajitsvyu:264: na ca sa bhikṣū rājño 'jitasenasya pārśvam āgacchati /
K14ajitsvyu:265: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:267: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa /
K14ajitsvyu:268: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:269: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattam abhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:270: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:273: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:274: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitās te sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātam avacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti /
K14ajitsvyu:275: atha rājā ajitasenas taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:280: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata / (Asv 117)
K14ajitsvyu:297: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇam udīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:298: atha rājānam ajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:303: na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāś ca //
K14ajitsvyu:322: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇam udīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:325: evam astu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapātaṃ tava gṛhe /
K14ajitsvyu:326: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
K14ajitsvyu:327: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājānam ajitasenam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:328: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmir asti /
K14ajitsvyu:330: asti mahāśrāvaka udyānabhūmir mama ramaṇīyā suśobhanā /
K14ajitsvyu:338: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇās te sarve santīti /
K14ajitsvyu:339: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyas tāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyas tā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:340: tāś ca puṣkariṇyaḥ suvarṇasopānasaṃcchannā divyā ramaṇīyāḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:341: ye ca jāṃbūpakaparibhogaguṇās te sarve santīti /
K14ajitsvyu:343: (Asv 120) ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayas te nānārutāni kurvanti sma /
K14ajitsvyu:345: suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:347: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:348: atha rājā ajitasenas taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:353: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata /
K14ajitsvyu:363: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt* /
K14ajitsvyu:364: atha rāja ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
K14ajitsvyu:365: (Asv 121) atha tena bherīśabdena sametyāmātyagaṇas taṃ rājānam ajitasenam evam āha /
K14ajitsvyu:368: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt* /
K14ajitsvyu:370: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghram eva tad hastiratham aśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ /

K14ajitsvyu:404: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

K14ajitsvyu:414: saṃtrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭayan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putram evam āha /

K14ajitsvyu:420: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi
K14ajitsvyu:423: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣair na bhūtair na ca rākṣasaiḥ /
K14ajitsvyu:427: kalyāṇamitram ayaṃ āsī tava kāraṇam āgatam* /
K14ajitsvyu:431: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim* /
